content.rendered:
The Fifth Canadian Chopin Piano Competition and Festival

August 23 – 29, 2019

Friday August 23

John Paul II Polish Cultural Centre, 4300 Cawthra Road, Mississauga

7:00 pm Opening Concert featuring performance by Canadian Chopin Piano Competition Prize Winners.
Individual Tickets: $25.00/ $15.00 students

Saturday August 24

Mazzoleni Hall: The Royal Conservatory, 273 Bloor St W., Toronto

10:00 am Senior Division Preliminary Round
Free Admission
7:00 pm Insights: An Evening with Alan Walker
Individual Tickets: $25.00/ $15.00 students

Sunday August 25

Mazzoleni Hall: The Royal Conservatory, 273 Bloor St W., Toronto

10:00 am Senior Division Preliminary Round
Free Admission
7:00 pm Conversations: An Evening with the Jury
Individual Tickets: $25.00/ $15.00 students

Monday August 26

Mazzoleni Hall: The Royal Conservatory, 273 Bloor St W., Toronto

10:00 am Senior Division Semi-Final Round
Free Admission
7:00 pm Portraits: Words and Music
Individual Tickets: $25.00/ $15.00 students

Tuesday August 27

Mazzoleni Hall: The Royal Conservatory, 273 Bloor St W., Toronto

9:00 am Junior Division Preliminary Round
Free Admission

Wednesday August 28

Koerner Hall: The Royal Conservatory, 273 Bloor Sr W., Toronto

7:00 pm Krzysztof Jablonski, solo recital
Individual Tickets: $40.00, $50.00, $60.00, $75.00

Thursday August 29

Koerner Hall: The Royal Conservatory, 273 Bloor St W., Toronto

10:00 am Junior Division, Final Round
2:00 pm Senior Division, Final Round
7:00 pm
9:00 pm		 Senior Division, Final Round
Results and Awards Ceremony
Individual Tickets: $30.00, $40.00, $50.00

FESTIVAL PASS:     $150  ($100 for Canadian Chopin Society members)
Pass includes admission to ALL events and includes reserved seating.
Reserved seating will be held till 10 minutes before start time .
